message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this amazing product for a one-time price of $20,000. It's a steal at twice the value it's worth to you!
Alice, that price is way too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't go above $8,000.  What do you say?

I understand you're a savvy negotiator, Bob! I can see you're willing to walk away if you don't get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I'll sell the product to you for $12,000. It's a fair price, considering the value it holds for you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $12,000 is still a bit too much for me. I'm really serious about buying this product, but I can't go higher than $9,000. If you're willing to meet me there, we have a deal.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'll sell the product to you for $10,500. It's a great deal for both of us, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with that price.  I'm willing to go up to $9,500.  That's my final offer. Let me know if you're willing to accept it.
